column28: he was a member/parishioner of bayou blue assembly of god. carl was avid hunter and fisherman who loved everything about the outdoors. his greatest passion was playing with his grandchildren. he had a passion for country music and singing. he loved many and was loved by many. he will be sadly missed by all who knew him. in lieu of flowers the family request donations to the american cancer society or a charity of choice.
